text: Very quiet and clean surau. Location is away from the busy highway. Clean, calm and comfortable  prayer hall, though it may be small but the atmosphere is equivalent to any big mosque

Although it is named as a surau, its like a small mosque. Even jumaah prayer is conducted here every friday. The mosque should be renovated to accomodate more people as there are many muslims nearby but no other mosque in the vicinity

I am very happy for Allah give me this place to pray my jumma

Al-Hamthulilah

I thought today I lost my jummah

But Al-Hamthulilah got with Allah help

Alhamdulillah, during my 3 weeks at SGH visiting my daughter, I find is convenient by able to do my prayers.Good and we'll maintain by the Surau care taker.Keep it up with good jobs.May Allah bless all the care taker.üëçüëçüëç

Place next to the canteen. Clean and fresh area. Available for Muslimah area as well. Bench and table provided at the entrance and adjacent to the ablutions. Carpark nearby is available to the public on Saturday and Sunday whilst weekdays available after 5 pm.
